Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by West Texas in 1981...
Had first career hit on 4/20/1981, off Mike Roleke (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/21/1984, off Shirley Espinosa (DIA)...
Injured on 6/23/1985 with a Sore Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/19/1990 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/28/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Injured on 5/18/1991 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
